description:
This dashboard provides real-time insights into the scaling, cost, usage, and right-sizing activities managed by Spot Ocean within your Kubernetes cluster. It showcases metrics related to node provisioning, optimization, cost efficiency, and recovery operations. The visualizations help you understand how Spot Ocean dynamically manages Kubernetes cluster resources to ensure optimal performance, cost savings, and high availability. Key actions such as scale-ups, scale-downs, node replacements, and manual interventions are highlighted to give a comprehensive view of your cluster's operational status and health.

It includes comprehensive data on compute, storage, and networking expenses, helping you monitor and optimize cloud spending. Visualizations highlight the cost distribution across different resource types and track usage patterns over time. This information empowers customers to make informed decisions about resource allocation, identify cost-saving opportunities, and ensure efficient utilization of cloud infrastructure. Additionally, the dashboard enables the evaluation of Ocean's right-sizing capability, demonstrating how efficient resource adjustments contribute to cost reduction while maintaining optimal cluster performance.

targets.expr: (sum(ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"}) or on() vector(0)) + (sum(ocean_storage_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"}) or on() vector(0)) + (sum(ocean_networking_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"}) or on() vector(0))

topk(5,
  sum by (resource_name) (
    sum by (resource_name) (ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"})
    or
    sum by (resource_name) (ocean_storage_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"})
    or
    sum by (resource_name) (ocean_networking_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type!='Node'})
  )
)

panels.title: Average Time to Get to Ready State Overtime

options.content:
• Scale Up - Node provisioned to satisfy pending pods/headroom requests.
  • Scale Down - Node terminated to optimize resource utilization.
  • On Demand to Spot Replacement - Spot node created instead of On Demand Node.
  • Lower Cost Replacement - Node replaced with a cheaper Node.
  • Shutdown Hours - Node stopped during scheduled hours.
  • Reserved Capacity Utilization - Node replaced with a Node from Reserved Instances or Saving Plans pools.
  • Recovery - Node provisioned to replace a Spot Node reclaimed by Cloud Provider.
  • Auto Healing - Node provisioned instead of an unhealthy Node.
  • Workload Migration - Node provisioned due to a workload migration process.
  • Cluster Roll - Node upgrade initiated by Administrator.
  • Manual Scaling - Node launched or terminated manually by Administrator.

• Launch error - Failed to scale up. Technical failure to launch required instances.
  • Cluster max instance count reached - Failed to scale up. Clusters reached maximum instance count running
  • VNG max instance count reached - Failed to scale up. Virtual Node Group reached the maximum instance count running.
  • VNG can't meet constraints - Failed to scale up. Virtual Node Group's onfiguration could not satisfy the Pod's constraints.
  • Topology constraints not met - Failed to scale up. Pod topology spread constraints could not be satisfied by the current group configuration.
  • Affinity rules not met - Failed to scale up. Pod's affinity/ anti-affinity could not be satisfied by the Virtual Node Group's configuration
  • No matching instances found - Failed to scale up. No instances matched all the pods' requested resources.
  • PVC issue - Failed to scale up. PVC requiements can't be handled.
  • VNG min instance count reached - Failed to scale down. Virtual Node Group has reached the minimum capacity of running instances.
  • Cluster min instance count reached - Failed to scale down. Cluster have reached the minimum capacity of running instances.

targets.expr:
sum by (pod_base) (
  label_replace(container_memory_usage_bytes{pod=~"ocean-controller-ocean-kubernetes-controller-.*", container!="POD", container!=""}, "pod_base", "ocean-kubernetes-controller-v2", "pod", "ocean-controller-ocean-kubernetes-controller-.*") or
  label_replace(container_memory_usage_bytes{pod=~"spotinst-kubernetes-cluster-controller-.*", container!="POD", container!=""}, "pod_base", "ocean-kubernetes-controller-v1", "pod", "spotinst-kubernetes-cluster-controller-.*")
)

panels.title: Ocean Kubernetes Controllers Memory Consumption Overtime

targets.expr:
sum by (pod_base) (
  label_replace(container_memory_usage_bytes{pod=~"ocean-controller-metrics-server-.*", container!="POD", container!=""}, "pod_base", "ocean-metrics-server", "pod", "ocean-controller-metrics-server-.*") or
  label_replace(container_memory_usage_bytes{pod=~"spot-ocean-metric-exporter-.*", container!="POD", container!=""}, "pod_base", "ocean-metric-exporter", "pod", "spot-ocean-metric-exporter-.*")
)

panels.title: Ocean Metrics Controllers Memory Consumption Overtime

targets.expr: ((sum(ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"}) or on() vector(0)) + (sum(ocean_storage_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"}) or on() vector(0)) + (sum(ocean_networking_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"}) or on() vector(0)))

(sum(ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"}) or on() vector(0)) +(sum(ocean_storage_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"}) or on() vector(0))+(sum(ocean_networking_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"}) or on() vector(0))

(sum(ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"} offset $interval) or on() vector(0)) +(sum(ocean_storage_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"} offset $interval) or on() vector(0))+(sum(ocean_networking_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"} offset $interval) or on() vector(0))

panels.title: Cluster Cost Overtime  vs Previous Period

targets.expr: ((sum(ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"}) or on() vector(0)) + (sum(ocean_storage_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"}) or on() vector(0)) + (sum(ocean_networking_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id"}) or on() vector(0)))/7

sum by (resource) (
label_replace(ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="ds"}, "resource", "DaemonSet", "resource_type", "ds") or 
label_replace(ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="d"}, "resource", "Deployment", "resource_type", "d") or
label_replace(ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="headroom"}, "resource", "Headroom", "resource_type", "headroom") or
label_replace(ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="j"}, "resource", "Job", "resource_type", "j") or
label_replace(ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="rs"}, "resource", "ReplicaSet", "resource_type", "rs") or
label_replace(ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="ss"}, "resource", "StatefulSet", "resource_type", "ss") or
label_replace(ocean_compute_cost{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type!~"d|ds|headroom|j|rs|ss"}, "resource", "Other", "resource_type", ".*")
)

sum by (resource) (
label_replace(ocean_cpu_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="ds"}, "resource", "DaemonSet", "resource_type", "ds") or 
label_replace(ocean_cpu_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="d"}, "resource", "Deployment", "resource_type", "d") or
label_replace(ocean_cpu_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="headroom"}, "resource", "Headroom", "resource_type", "headroom") or
label_replace(ocean_cpu_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="j"}, "resource", "Job", "resource_type", "j") or
label_replace(ocean_cpu_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="rs"}, "resource", "ReplicaSet", "resource_type", "rs") or
label_replace(ocean_cpu_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="ss"}, "resource", "StatefulSet", "resource_type", "ss") or
label_replace(ocean_cpu_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type!~"d|ds|headroom|j|rs|ss"}, "resource", "Other", "resource_type", ".*")
) / 1000

sum by (resource) (
label_replace(ocean_memory_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="ds"}, "resource", "DaemonSet", "resource_type", "ds") or 
label_replace(ocean_memory_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="d"}, "resource", "Deployment", "resource_type", "d") or
label_replace(ocean_memory_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="headroom"}, "resource", "Headroom", "resource_type", "headroom") or
label_replace(ocean_memory_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="j"}, "resource", "Job", "resource_type", "j") or
label_replace(ocean_memory_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="rs"}, "resource", "ReplicaSet", "resource_type", "rs") or
label_replace(ocean_memory_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type="ss"}, "resource", "StatefulSet", "resource_type", "ss") or
label_replace(ocean_memory_usage{ocean_id="$ocean_id", resource_type!~"d|ds|headroom|j|rs|ss"}, "resource", "Other", "resource_type", ".*")
)
